House Bill/Resolution NO. PS00052
FULL TITLE : NEED TO PASS A COMPREHENSIVE AGRARIAN REFORM LAW ACHIEVE PEACE AND SUSTAINABLE DEVELOPMENT IN THE COUNTRYSIDE
SHORT TITLE : Agrarian Reform
ABSTRACT : Rep. Villarin spoke on the issue of agrarian reform, specifically discussing the implementation of the Comprehensive Agrarian Reform Law (CARL) which he said, the government must address in order to achieve peace and sustainable development in the countryside. He pointed out that President Rodrigo Roa Duterte made an emphatic commitment to agrarian reform when he appointed a genuine peasant leader and a true champion of the farmers, Rafael “Ka Paeng” V. Mariano as Secretary of Agrarian Reform...; made a narrative summary of the implementation of the CARL as well as the Comprehensive Agrarian Reform Program Extension with Reforms (CARPER) Act under Republic Act 9700 during the past administrations,... (SOURCE: House Journal No.14,p.15)
